---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r Descriptive Statistics}
summary(select(params$data, count, crude_rate))
```

```{r Histogram of Case Counts}
ggplot(params$data, aes(x = count)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 50, fill = "steelblue", color = "white") +
  labs(title = "Histogram of Case Counts", x = "Case Count", y = "Frequency") +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r Crude Rate by Year and Age Group}
summary_plot <- params$data %>%
  group_by(year, age_group_in_years) %>%
  summarise(mean_crude_rate = mean(crude_rate, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = mean_crude_rate, color = age_group_in_years)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Crude Rate by Year", y = "Mean Crude Rate") +
  theme_minimal()
summary_plot
```
